sentences.en: ...her blind faith in the wisdom of the church.
sentences.cn: …她对教会箴言的盲目信仰

sentences.en: a school for blind children
sentences.cn: 盲童学校

sentences.en: Beverley was born blind .
sentences.cn: 贝弗利先天失明。

sentences.en: blind faith/obedience
sentences.cn: 盲目的信念；盲从

sentences.en: Confusingly, blind people also respond to the light.
sentences.cn: 令人困惑的是，盲人对亮光也有反应。

sentences.en: David's good looks and impeccable manners had always made her blind to his faults.
sentences.cn: 大卫俊朗的外表和完美的风度总是令她对他的缺点视而不见。

sentences.en: Doctors think he will go blind .
sentences.cn: 医生们认为他会失明。

sentences.en: Doctors think he will go blind.
sentences.cn: 医生们认为他会失明。

sentences.en: For this revelation he was struck blind by the goddess Hera.
sentences.cn: 由于揭露此事，他被女神赫拉弄瞎了眼。

sentences.en: He found comfort in Eva's blind faith in him.
sentences.cn: 伊娃对他的盲目信任让他感到宽慰。

sentences.en: He was a teacher of the blind.
sentences.cn: 他曾教过盲人。

sentences.en: He was slowly going blind (=  becoming blind  ) .
sentences.cn: 他眼睛在渐渐失明。

sentences.en: Her mother groped for the back of the chair, her eyes blind with tears.
sentences.cn: 她妈妈摸索着椅背，她的眼睛被眼泪遮住了视线。

sentences.en: How would you explain colour to a blind person?
sentences.cn: 你如何向盲人解释颜色？

sentences.en: I can't turn a blind eye when someone is being robbed.
sentences.cn: 当有人遭到抢劫时，我不能视而不见。

sentences.en: I didn't know anything about fighting and neither did my students—it was the blind leading the blind.
sentences.cn: 我对搏斗一无所知，我的学生们也是——这是瞎子带瞎子。

sentences.en: I started helping him run the business when he went blind.
sentences.cn: 他失明以后，我就开始帮他打理生意。

sentences.en: In a double-blind trial, there were definite improvements.
sentences.cn: 在双盲试验中，改善效果明显。

sentences.en: In heavily infected areas, half the population become blind.
sentences.cn: 在受污染严重的地区，有一半人口失明。

sentences.en: Lesley yelled at him with blind, hating rage.
sentences.cn: 莱斯莉心生愤恨，盛怒之下对他大嚷大叫。

sentences.en: Sixteen times as many men are colour-blind as women.
sentences.cn: 男性色盲为女性色盲的16倍。

sentences.en: The blinds were drawn (=  pulled down  ) to protect the new furniture from the sun.
sentences.cn: 窗帘都放了下来，避免太阳光照在新的家具上。

sentences.en: the needs of blind people
sentences.cn: 盲人的需要

sentences.en: The nest contained eight little mice that were naked and blind.
sentences.cn: 窝里有8只还没长毛、眼睛尚未睁开的小老鼠。

sentences.en: The prime minister has a blind spot on ethical issues.
sentences.cn: 这位首相无视道德问题。

sentences.en: There are 1.7 million blind and visually impaired people in Britain.
sentences.cn: 英国有170万失明和视力受损人口。

sentences.en: West was wilfully blind to the abuse that took place.
sentences.cn: 韦斯特对发生的虐待行为故意视而不见。

words.tran_cn: 使人眩目的；使人失去判断力的
眨眼的；闪光的；可恶的；十足的；一眨眼的
眨眼睛；闪闪发光；对…视而不见（blink的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)视力极差的，几乎看不见的
死胡同；没有前途的职业
盲区；静区；封闭地块；阴影区
[口语] 近乎全盲的；视力很差的，眼力不行的；鼠目寸光的；完全看不见东西的
n. 从未见面的男女经第三者安排所作的约会
（视网膜上的）盲点；（驾驶车辆等视力以外的）盲区；偏见；无知

phrases.phrase: there's none so blind as those who will not see
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)和不讲理的人说理——白搭；无眼不算瞎，有眼不看是真瞎
装作没有看见，视而不见

phrases.phrase: when the blind lead the blind, both shall fall int
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)"瞎子带瞎子，两个掉沟里"（喻没有相关知识或经验就不要指导别人或给别人提建议）
遮光帘；百叶窗（等于window shade）

trans.tran_cn: 失明的，双眼模糊的，未察觉的，隐蔽的，不理性的，盲目的，封死的
trans.tran_en: blind flying is when you use only instruments to fly an aircraft because you cannot see through cloud, mist etc
to make it difficult for someone to see for a short time
a trick or excuse to stop someone from discovering the truth

trans.tran_cn: 使…看不见，使眼花，使思维混沌，使无法认清
trans.tran_en: to make someone lose their good sense or judgment and be unable to see the truth about something
to make it difficult for someone to see for a short time
